67  CommunicationThread& operator=(const CommunicationThread& other)
68  {
69  std::lock(m, other.m);
70  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> self_lock(m, std::adopt_lock);
71  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> other_lock(other.m, std::adopt_lock);
72  active = other.active;
73  notified = other.notified;
74  lock = std::unique_lock<std::mutex>(m);
75  return *this;
76  }

81  virtual void startThread() = 0;
85  virtual void stopThread() = 0;
89  virtual void workerFunction() = 0;
93  inline void sleep()
94  {
95  notified = false;
96  while (!notified) // loop to avoid spurious wakeups
97  {
98  cond_var.wait(lock);
99  }
100  }
104  inline void wakeUp()
105  {
106  notified = true;
107  cond_var.notify_one();
108  }
109 
110 private:
111  mutable std::mutex m;
112  std::condition_variable cond_var;
113  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lock;
114  bool notified;
